83248.summary: Some customers in the Ellerslie area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83248.title: Sept 22 - Edmonton (Ellerslie) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

83266.summary: Some customers in the Sunnybrook area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83266.title: Sept 22 - Red Deer (Sunnybrook) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
